all_states.title: Use All States
all_states.description:
Select entities for which all states should be used.
Note that this only applies to entities whose source type is not GPS.

ep_input_entity.title: Picture Entity
ep_input_entity.description:
Choose entity whose picture will be used for the composite.
It may be none.

ep_local_file.title: Local Picture File
ep_local_file.description:
Choose local file to be used for the composite.
It may be none.

ep_menu.title: Composite Entity Picture
ep_menu.description:
Choose source of composite's entity picture.

Currently: {cur_source}

menu_options.ep_none: Do not use an entity picture

ep_upload_file.title: Upload Picture File
ep_upload_file.description:
Upload a file to be used for the composite.
It may be none.

ep_warn.title: File Upload Directory Created
ep_warn.description:
/local directory ({local_dir}) was created.
Home Assistant may need to be restarted for uploaded files to be usable.

error.at_least_one_entity: Must select at least one input entity.
